email.title: Optiver - Interested in Working in Trading or Software Engineering?
email.text:
![Optiver Presentation](https://i.imgur.com/kkYgra3.png)
Optiver are hosting a company presentation **tonight at 6pm**:
Participants will have the chance to chat with our engineer and traders as well as participate in a quiz with the chance to win an iPad.
Sign up link: https://r1.dotdigital-pages.com/p/33S1-72Q/imperial-company-presentation
Zoom details:
https://optiver-ams.zoom.us/j/97470023078?pwd=V3h4OEVVcWVHYVI3V0lmT0VSdm0wUT09
Meeting ID: `974 7002 3078`
Password: `13890912`
